job.title: Technical Architect
job.description:
Customer Success Group
The Professional Services Delivery team are the post-sales implementers of Tableau solutions, and therefore highly customer-facing. The
is a Lead in the Professional Services Delivery team. At this level it is expected that the incumbent will be an experienced Consultant/Architect and proficient at end-to-end Solution Architecture and Customer Engagement. In this role, the incumbent will be expected to spend more than 70% of their time on-site with customers or working on customer-assigned work.
Within the Professional Services team the TA will be highly skilled in Tableau-adjacent technologies that help Tableau integrate in a complex customer deployment. Being a leadership role, the incumbent will regularly be the first to deploy a new offering and then enable others on the team to do so.
A key aspect of Consulting at Tableau is nurturing customers to drive adoption and repeat purchases. The TA is responsible for guiding the engagement to enable those objectives and providing feedback to the Sales teams about future opportunities.
If you require assistance due to a disability applying for open positions please submit a request via this Accommodations Request Form.
